main event: A sighting of an unidentified flying object with reported black billowy smoke and a reddish glow observed over a two hour period in Phoenix, Arizona.
interesting points: The object was reported to be low flying and dropping flares,The shape was described as elliptical or possibly two separate objects,One group of observers compared the size to a piper cub aircraft,The object appeared to pulsate around the edges as it hovered,Observers noted that there were no sounds associated with the sighting.
sighted object: one or possibly two elliptical objects with a reddish glow
witness description: Civilian observers including a school teacher and two others of varying reliability, ages 29 to 35
